name: Skyous
description:
This challenging 2D platformer has a lot to offer. Quirky mechanics, fun music, and colorful graphics. Pretty tough adventure with nice backgrounds that keeps you wanting to explore the world and push through the difficulty. Skyous will definitely challenge your skills.

  • Control Skyous in an odd semi-isometric world. Where logic and physics change rapidly!
  • Save world major cities from Imitheos control
  • Find clues of Imitheos origins
  • Checkpoints challenges: attempt and hit checkpoints albeit their abrupt rotation speed
  • Marmaros challenges: a race against the infinite Marmaros to clear cities. Speed and accuracy are necessary
  • Move challenges: maintain your movement and speed, or else your Dynamia bar will shrink and collapse
  • Get your feet in a precise position when jumping in Petrifield. They can be very tricky.



[ 7 Cities ]
Enjoy playing a real-world adventure from Sao Paulo to Athens and across 7 different cities.
